description: Successful av engine/pattern update.

event.Summary: AV engine or pattern updated successfully

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casAntivirusUpdateSuccess BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casAvVendorName s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casAvEngineVersion s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casAvPatternVersion s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casAvPatternDateTime s EXAMPLEE

description: AntiVirus vendor name.

description: AV engine version.

description: AV pattern version.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casAvPatternVersion

description: Release date and time of the av pattern.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casAvPatternDateTime

description: Av engine/pattern update failed, casUpdateFailureReason provides more details.

event.Summary: AV engine or pattern update failed: $v1

description: The URL for use in notifications.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casUrl

description: More details about the scan exception.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::avErrorDetails

description: The antivirus license is about to expire.

event.Summary: Antivirus license will expire in $v1 days

description: Content Analysis System license days remaining.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casLicenseDaysRemaining

description: The warning from the Intelligent Connection Traffic Monitoring
feature that the number of 'slow' connections has crossed the
threshold value.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == '') ? 'Number of slow connections $v2 exceeded the threshold value' : '$v1'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casICTMWarning BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casICTMWarningReason s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casSlowICAPConnections u 9999

description: The reason of the Intelligent Connection Traffic Monitoring warning.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casICTMWarningReason

description: The number of ICAP connections that are considered 'slow' -
receiving data for more than the configured time threshold
(by default 60 seconds).
variables.name: BLUECOAT-CAS-MIB::casSlowICAPConnections
